Introduction

API (formerly Ho1iday) was a five-member girl group under BRICKWORKS Company. They debuted on April 19, 2019 with their first digital single "Fantasy". On January 10, 2020, the group announced that they have changed their name from Ho1iday to API.

Sometime in 2021, they deleted their Twitter account and removed all their Instagram posts. As such, it is safe to assume they have disbanded.
